name: beanie
description: A hat or beanie helps to retain heat and keep your head warm.

name: boots
description: Closed-toe shoes or boots with good insulation are essential for keeping your feet warm and dry

name: flip flop
description: Open-toed shoes like flip-flops or sandals are ideal for keeping your feet cool.

name: gloves
description: Keep your hands warm with insulated gloves or mittens.

name: heavy jacket
description: A warm, insulated coat or parka is essential for keeping you warm in freezing temperatures.

name: hoodie
description: A lightweight sweater or pullover adds extra warmth and can be layered over your long-sleeve shirt.

name: jacket
description: A medium-weight jacket or coat made of materials like fleece, wool, or a quilted style can be suitable for this temperature range.

name: light jacket
description: A light jacket, cardigan, or sweater is often sufficient for 60-degree weather, especially in the daytime

name: long sleeve shirt
description: A base layer like a long-sleeve shirt or blouse provides warmth and can be paired with other layers.

name: sandals
description: Comfortable and breathable footwear like sneakers or sandals is perfect for this weather.

name: scarf
description: A scarf can help keep your neck warm and is easy to adjust as the temperature changes.

name: shorts
description: horts are ideal for staying cool in 70-degree weather. They come in various styles and lengths.

name: skirt
description: skirts for a comfortable and feminine look

name: tank tops
description: tank tops for a cool and comfortable summer look

name: sneaker
description: Closed-toe shoes or sneakers provide adequate protection and comfort for 50-degree weather.

name: sweater
description: A lightweight sweater or cardigan can be layered over your long-sleeve shirt for extra warmth.

name: heavy_sweater
description: Wear a thick sweater or fleece as a mid-layer for added insulation.

name: t-shirt
description: Short-sleeve t-shirts are comfortable for mild temperatures

name: sunglasses
description: sunglasses can protect your eyes from the sun's glare
